impact: Launched exclusive New Year fashion collection featuring 50+ new items, resulting in 25% increase in January sales
Cleared 80% of winter inventory with up to 60% discounts, improving cash flow for spring collection investment
Introduced limited-edition romantic cosmetics collection, achieving 15% boost in cosmetics revenue
Executed multi-channel 'Love Your Style' campaign reaching 2M+ customers globally, 30% increase in gift purchases
Launched eco-friendly clothing line with recycled materials, attracting environmentally conscious customers and positive brand image
Released empowering women's fashion collection with 10% of proceeds donated to women's charities, enhanced brand reputation
Increased number of customers due to our marketing effort with 40% traffic surge and 20% new customer acquisition
Partnered with emerging designers for Spring Fashion Week, gaining premium brand positioning and 50% increase in high-end sales
Launched redesigned mobile shopping app with improved user experience, resulting in 35% increase in mobile conversions
Distributed quarterly rewards to loyalty members, achieving 90% customer retention rate and increased average order value by 18%
